name: Simon Says (aquova)
description:
It is what it says on the box - it's Simon Says! This game was made for TweetTweetJam 2, and was made in less than 560 characters. 554 if you ask Pico-8.

The computer will show a pattern while the background is green. When the background is purple, it's your turn to enter in the same pattern. Use the arrow keys to enter in the four directions.
